name: movie
description: A template for capturing details of movies, including title, genre, language, and more.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the movie.

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the movieâ€™s poster image.

fields.name: release_year
fields.description: The year the movie was first released.

fields.name: director
fields.description: The primary director(s) of the movie.

fields.name: cast
fields.description: Main actors and actresses starring in the movie.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) spoken in the movie.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The genre(s) or category of the movie.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country or countries where the movie was produced.

fields.name: synopsis
fields.description: A brief summary of the movieâ€™s plot.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the movie.

fields.name: runtime
fields.description: The total duration of the movie in minutes.

fields.name: trailer_url
fields.description: A URL linking to the movieâ€™s official trailer.

name: tv_series
description: A template for capturing details of TV series, including title, genre, seasons, and more.

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the TV seriesâ€™ poster image.

fields.name: first_air_year
fields.description: The year the TV series first aired.

fields.name: end_year
fields.description: The year the TV series ended, if applicable.

fields.name: created_by
fields.description: The creator(s) or showrunner(s) of the TV series.

fields.name: cast
fields.description: Main actors and actresses starring in the TV series.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) spoken in the TV series.

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre(s) or category of the TV series.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country or countries where the TV series was produced.

fields.name: synopsis
fields.description: A brief summary of the TV seriesâ€™ plot.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the TV series.

fields.name: average_runtime
fields.description: The average duration of each episode in minutes.

fields.name: number_of_seasons
fields.description: The total number of seasons in the TV series.

fields.name: number_of_episodes
fields.description: The total number of episodes in the TV series.

fields.name: network_or_platform
fields.description: The network or streaming platform where the TV series airs.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the TV series (e.g., ongoing, ended, canceled).

fields.name: trailer_url
fields.description: A URL linking to the TV seriesâ€™ official trailer.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the TV series.

name: variety_show
description: A template for capturing details of variety shows, including title, host, genre, and episode details.

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the variety showâ€™s poster image.

fields.name: first_air_year
fields.description: The year the variety show first aired.

fields.name: end_year
fields.description: The year the variety show ended, if applicable.

fields.name: network_or_platform
fields.description: The network or platform where the variety show airs (e.g., KBS, Netflix).

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre(s) or category of the variety show.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) the variety show is broadcast in.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of origin of the variety show.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the variety showâ€™s format or content.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the variety show.

fields.name: average_runtime
fields.description: The average runtime of each episode in minutes.

fields.name: episode_count
fields.description: The total number of episodes aired.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the variety show (e.g., Ongoing, Ended, Canceled).

fields.name: trailer_url
fields.description: A URL linking to a trailer or promotional video for the variety show.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host(s) of the variety show.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the variety show.

name: book
description: A template for capturing details of books, including novels, with metadata like title, author, genre, and source URL.

fields.name: publication_year
fields.description: The year the book was first published.

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: The company that published the book.

fields.name: isbn
fields.description: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) the book is written in.

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre(s) or category of the book.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country where the book was published or originated.

fields.name: synopsis
fields.description: A brief summary of the bookâ€™s plot or content.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the book.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the book, if applicable.

fields.name: page_count
fields.description: The total number of pages in the book.

fields.name: format
fields.description: The physical or digital format of the book (e.g., Hardcover, Paperback, E-book).

fields.name: source_url
fields.description: A URL linking to the bookâ€™s page on its source platform (e.g., Book.com).

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the bookâ€™s cover image.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author(s) of the book.

name: music
description: A template for capturing details of music entries, such as songs or albums, including title, artist, genre, and more.

fields.name: release_year
fields.description: The year the music was released.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The record label that released the music.

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre(s) or style of the music.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) of the lyrics, if applicable.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of origin of the artist or release.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the music, such as its theme or background.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the music, if applicable (e.g., for explicit lyrics).

fields.name: duration
fields.description: The duration of the music in minutes (total for an album, or for a single track).

fields.name: track_count
fields.description: The number of tracks, if the music entry is an album.

fields.name: format
fields.description: The release format of the music (e.g., Digital, CD, Vinyl).

fields.name: audio_url
fields.description: A URL linking to a preview or streaming link for the music.

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the album artwork or cover image.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the music (e.g., song or album name).

fields.name: artist
fields.description: The artist(s) or band name responsible for the music.

name: podcast
description: A template for capturing details of podcasts, including title, host, genre, and episode details.

fields.name: release_year
fields.description: The year the podcast first released.

fields.name: network
fields.description: The network or platform hosting the podcast (e.g., Spotify, Apple Podcasts).

fields.name: genre
fields.description: The genre(s) or category of the podcast.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language(s) the podcast is recorded in.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of origin of the podcast.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the podcastâ€™s content or focus.

fields.name: content_rating
fields.description: The age-appropriateness rating of the podcast, if applicable (e.g., for explicit content).

fields.name: average_episode_duration
fields.description: The average duration of podcast episodes in minutes.

fields.name: episode_count
fields.description: The total number of episodes released.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the podcast (e.g., Active, Completed, On Hiatus).

fields.name: audio_url
fields.description: A URL linking to a sample episode or streaming link for the podcast.

fields.name: poster
fields.description: URL to the podcastâ€™s cover image.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official title of the podcast.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host(s) or creator(s) of the podcast.
